text:
> This is primarily for logging purposes so we can see which user has performed what action but would also be good to see which team the user belongs to
Mitchell, Can you tell me the goal for logging this information? Who would be using it, and how?
<@U03FJQPSC0Y> looks like the workflows team just made this update for workflow custom actions:
Sure <@U03FJQPSC0Y> Our customer wanted a record of which user performed what action. We are building out a point of sale system so they want to know who has taken payments, provided refunds, etc..
Thanks, Mitchell. Would you be able to DM me more information about the use case? That'll help me think through a better experience for this scenarios.
